member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Barcode.BarcodeReader.InitLicenseFromServer(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes barcode reader license and connects to the specified server for online verification.
member.param: The name/IP of the license server
The license key of Barcode Reader.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Barcode.BarcodeReader.InitLicenseFromLicenseContent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes barcode reader license and connects to the specified server for online verification.
member.param: The license key of Barcode Reader.
An encrypted string representing the license content (runtime number, expiry date, barcode type, etc.) obtained from the method OutputLicenseToString().

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Barcode.BarcodeReader.OutputLicenseToString
member.summary: Outputs the license content as an encrypted string from the license server to be used for offline license verification.
member.returns: The output string which stores the contents of license.

members.member: @defgroup DoNetCamptiableStruct PublicRuntimeSettings Struct @{

Sets the priority of localization algorithms to decide the ordering of the following four localization algorithms.
@par Default values: "" @par Optional localization algorithms: "ConnectedBlocks", "Statistics", "Lines", "FullImageAsBarcodeZone" @par Remarks: - Default value: The library will automatically use optimized localization priority, i.e. ConnectedBlocks -> Statistics -> Lines -> FullImageAsBarcodeZone, which is also the recommended order.
- ConnectedBlocks: Localizes barcodes by searching connected blocks. This algorithm usually gives best result and it is recommended to set ConnectedBlocks to the highest priority.
- Statistics: Localizes barcodes by groups of contiguous black-white regions. This is optimized for QRCode and DataMatrix.
- Lines: Localizes barcodes by searching for groups of lines. This is optimized for 1D and PDF417 barcodes.
- FullImageAsBarcodeZone: Disables localization. In this mode, it will directly localize barcodes on the full image without localization. If there is nothing other than the barcode in the image, it is recommended to use this mode.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.Barcode.PublicRuntimeSettings.mReserved
member.summary: Reserved memory for struct. The length of this array indicates the size of the memory reserved for this struct.

members.member:
Sets the block size for the process of binarization. Block size refers to the size of a pixel neighborhood used to calculate a threshold value for the pixel. @par Value range: [0,1000] @par Default: 0 @par Remarks: - 0: the block size used for binarization will be set to a value which is calculated automatically.
- N: - 1 N 3: the block size used for binarization will be set to 3. - N > 3: the block size used for binarization will be set to N.
An appropriate value for mBinarizationBlockSize can help generate a high quality binary image to increase the accuracy of barcode localization.

Stores the name of the struct, which is mainly help users to distinguish different version rather than practical use in the library.
@deprecated mName

Sets the priority of localization algorithms to decide the ordering of the following four localization algorithms.
@par Default values: "" @par Optional localization algorithms: "ConnectedBlocks", "Statistics", "Lines", "FullImageAsBarcodeZone" @par Remarks: - Default value: The library will automatically use optimized localization priority, i.e. ConnectedBlocks -> Statistics -> Lines -> FullImageAsBarcodeZone, which is also the recommended order.
- ConnectedBlocks: Localizes barcodes by searching connected blocks. This algorithm usually gives best result and it is recommended to set ConnectedBlocks to the highest priority.
- Statistics: Localizes barcodes by groups of contiguous black-white regions. This is optimized for QRCode and DataMatrix.
- Lines: Localizes barcodes by searching for groups of lines. This is optimized for 1D and PDF417 barcodes.
- FullImageAsBarcodeZone: Disables localization. In this mode, it will directly localize barcodes on the full image without localization. If there is nothing other than the barcode in the image, it is recommended to use this mode.

member.name: F:Dynamsoft.Barcode.PublicParameterSettings.mReserved
member.summary: Reserved memory for struct. The length of this array indicates the size of the memory reserved for this struct.

members.member:
Sets the block size for the process of binarization. Block size refers to the size of a pixel neighborhood used to calculate a threshold value for the pixel. @par Value range: [0,1000] @par Default: 0 @par Remarks: - 0: the block size used for binarization will be set to a value which is calculated automatically.
- N: - 1 N 3: the block size used for binarization will be set to 3. - N > 3: the block size used for binarization will be set to N.
An appropriate value for mBinarizationBlockSize can help generate a high quality binary image to increase the accuracy of barcode localization.
